subject: device-node: Add null check operation of interface function
commitMessage:
device-node: Add null check operation of interface function

If there is no interface for something to do,
it will return -ENODEV error instead of segfault.

Signed-off-by: Jiyoung Yun <jy910.yun@samsung.com>
Change-Id: If9dfdaecf53c88e14879dc66986e12cdcd1c2355

comments.message:
Patch Set 1: Verified+1

Currently deviced occurs crash in nuc board (ia32-wayland) because of null pointer access.
IVI profile including ia32 do not have an oem interface library that is a kind of HAL.
So if there is no interface library, it uses default library and also checks a null pointer access.

subject: Update the packaging to the current build context
commitMessage:
Update the packaging to the current build context

Previous version was accessing glib-2.0 through the
the requires directive of the pkgconfig of vconf.
Making that dependency explicit is better.

Also a problem of int to pointer cast was raising
an error when building for 64 bits archs.

Change-Id: I2078f2ab9c9f6a0c5f2a80c2cc3537c99b6c6951
Signed-off-by: José Bollo <jose.bollo@open.eurogiciel.org>
